name: Neste Oyj
membership: Alliance of Synthetic and Paraffinic Fuels Europe(ASFE), FuelsEurope, European Biodiesel Board (EBB), European Bioplastics Association, Cefic.
goal: To participate in and contribute to the European Union deliberations about energy, climate, the transportation sector, fuels, alternative fuels, biofuels and plastics policies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Renewable Energy Directive's follow-up decisions, follow-up of European Plasitcs Strategy, Co2 regulations of light duty and heavy duty vehichles, Clean Vehicles Directive.
